name: Bug Attack! (itch) (dev_mancer)
description:
A short comedy game about saving every bugs from their cruel human overlords.

You play as Commander Centipedus as he commands a fleet of Insect Ships to invade Earth. 

  • Over 3 Challenging Ships to use in over a million different combinations.  
  • Go Not just left and right, but also down. You can also control your ship speeds
  • Hyper Realistic Level Design
  • Over 9 Level of High Octane Simulation Action
  • Biting Political Commentary that Takes those Fat Cats in Washington down a peg and will spark a country wide revolution.

You don't play this game, it plays you. 

Coming soon... the finished product.
